mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT s."object_id" FROM "street" s JOIN "street_attribute" street_attr_name ON (street_attr_name."status" = 1 AND s."object_id" = street_attr_name."object_id" AND street_attr_name."entity_attribute_id" = 300) JOIN "street_string_value" street_name ON (street_name."id" = street_attr_name."value_id") WHERE s."status" = 1 AND s."parent_entity_id" = 400 and s."parent_id" = #{cityId} AND street_name."value" = #{street} AND exists( SELECT 1 FROM "building" b JOIN "building_attribute" ba ON (ba."status" = 1 AND ba."object_id" = b."object_id" AND ba."entity_attribute_id" = 503) JOIN "organization_attribute" oa ON (oa."status" = 1 AND oa."object_id" = #{organizationId} AND oa."entity_attribute_id" = 902) WHERE ba."value_id" = oa."value_id" AND b."status" = 1 AND b."parent_id" = s."object_id" AND b."parent_entity_id" = 300)
